oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy print of a crayon print of Amos Anderson of the US Army
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Amos Anderson was born in 1836 and died Sept. 14, 1864 at Gallatin, Tenn. He was from Idson, Hawkins County, Tenn. He married Elizabeth Bloomer in 1842. There is an Amos L. Anderson listed as a corporal in Co. L, 8th Tenn. Cav., USA. Company L was organized in Rogersville, Tenn. by Capt. Brown. They were on occupation duty in Gallatin, Tenn. in the summer of 1864.
